definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Charlie had gotten up who knows how early to put snow chains on my truck.
sentences.chinese: 誰知道查理斯多早起來在我的卡車上面裝上了防滑鏈。
